<title level="1" right="Rules">[Specific Magic Weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=767)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 600 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These weapons have abilities far different from what can be gained by simply etching runes. A specific magic weapon lists its [fundamental runes](/equipment/runes/fundamental-weapon-runes), which you can upgrade, add, or transfer as normal. You can't etch or transfer any [property runes](/equipment/runes/weapon-property-runes) onto a specific weapon that it doesn't already have, and you can't remove its property runes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
